p:
Lateral flow immunoassay (LFIA) is another rapid RSV detection method based on an immunochromatographic technique using the samples of nasal washes or aspirates. Many LFIA kits are now available in the market, such as BD Directigen EZ RSV, Binax Now RSV, RSV Respi‚ÄêStrip, Remel Xpect, and QuickLab RSV Test.
19 ,
20 ,
21 The sensitivity and specificity of the abovementioned kits are normally higher than 90% and 95%, but they differ by manufacturer.
